title: retroshare-tor-i2p-setup-guide
description:
Description for Retroshare-Tor-I2P-Setup-Guide:
A step by step guide and examples for Retroshare users to easily setup and use Regular Retroshare Nodes via a Socks5 Tor and/or I2P Proxy connection as well as a Hidden Retroshare Node via Tor and/or I2P to operate as fully Tor/I2P Hidden Services deep inside the Tor or I2P encrypted, anonymous network for extra layers of protections and privacys.

RetroShare 0.6.0 is a free C++,QT compiled cross-platform Windows,Linux,Arm,Mac private p2p sharing program that uses F2F public/private encrypted keys. It lets you share files, msgs, chats, channel content and forums securely with your friends, using a web-of-trust to authenticate peers and OpenSSL TLSv1.2 to encrypt all communication. RetroShare provides fast anonymous file sharing, chat, messages and channels. 

Retroshare 0.6.0 is a Open-Source,Secure,Encrypted Social Decentralized Network with many features and offers both Darknet and Tor,I2P connections as user options. Retroshare's Fast Anonymous File Sharing is Unparalleled with any other P2P and F2F networks.

Retroshare 0.6.0 is also easily configured as a user option to run the Regular Retroshare Node as a Socks5 Proxy via Tor and/or I2P or to run the Hidden Retroshare Node as a full Tor and/or I2P Hidden Service adding an extra layer of encryption,security and privacys on those anonymous global networks.

Come and Join the Fun, You'll Love it
